overview: Park Joon-yeong lives in a room styled with collages of women's faces and photos cut out of magazines. While walking around the neighborhood and taking pictures, Jun-yeong accidentally encounters Da-hye, a married woman. Joon-yeong is hooked on Da-hye as soon as he saw her for the first time. One day, Jun-yeong sees Da-hye with her husband Yoon Seong-gyoo and sees a shocking scene.
title: Married Neighbor
